// Structure: Array
#pragma once
#include <array>
#include <cstdint>
#include <limits>
#include <string_view>

class ArrayStructure_UInt32_4 final
{
    static constexpr std::array<uint32_t, 4> entries = {
        0, 1u, 2u, std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max()
    };

public:
    [[nodiscard]]
    static bool contains(const uint32_t value) noexcept
    {
        if (value < 0 || value > std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max())
            return false;

        for (size_t i = 0; i < 4; i++)
        {
            if (entries[i] == value)
               return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    static constexpr size_t item_count = 4;
    static constexpr uint32_t min_value = 0;
    static constexpr uint32_t max_value = std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max();

public:
    ArrayStructure_UInt32_4() = delete;
    ArrayStructure_UInt32_4(const ArrayStructure_UInt32_4&) = delete;
    ArrayStructure_UInt32_4& operator=(const ArrayStructure_UInt32_4&) = delete;
    ArrayStructure_UInt32_4(ArrayStructure_UInt32_4&&) = delete;
    ArrayStructure_UInt32_4& operator=(ArrayStructure_UInt32_4&&) = delete;
};
